synopsis.text: Osamu's beloved unicorn, Unico, embarks on a new adventure in a world devastated by human greed and environmental destruction. Alongside Tsubasa, a sentient tree boy, Unico traverses the desolate Earth in search of a solution to restore its habitability. After a grueling journey, they encounter the enigmatic Sphinx and the 'time fairy,' Astro Boy/Atom. Together, they devise a plan to travel back in time and steer humanity away from its disastrous path. With only five precious minutes in the past, Unico and Tsubasa must act swiftly to change the Earth's fate in this heartwarming tale celebrating the first anniversary of Tezuka Osamu Animation Theatre and its theme of 'Saving our Fragile Earth.'
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
